<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Refund Requests"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/dict-hub/refund"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets the list of refund requests that the participant is part of.

List of bounces is sorted ascending by the `LastModified` field.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"ParticipantRole":{"value":"REQUESTING"}},"name":"participantRole","description":"Participant's role in the refund","schema":{"enum":["REQUESTING","CONTESTED"],"type":"string"},"in":"query","required":true},{"examples":{"RefundtStatus":{"value":"\"WAITING_RESOLUTION\""}},"name":"status","description":"List of Status to be searched","schema":{"enum":["OPEN","CLOSED","CANCELLED"],"type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"IncludeDetails":{"value":"true"}},"name":"includeDetails","description":"Include refund details (Detail fields)","schema":{"default":false,"type":"boolean"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"RefundModifiedAfter":{"value":"\"2018-02-10T09:30.000Z\""}},"name":"modifiedAfter","description":"Filters refunds with modified date-time greater than or equal to `modifiedAfter`","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"RefundsModifiedBefore":{"value":"\"2018-02-10T09:30.000Z\""}},"name":"modifiedBefore","description":"Filters refunds with modified date-time less than or equal to `modifiedBefore`","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ClaimLimit":{"value":"20"}},"name":"limit","description":"Default: 20\r\nLimit number of refunds to return","schema":{"default":20,"maximum":200,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ExampleMerchantCustomerId":{"value":"\"28449ee1-0466-477b-95ce-0abc90c9f8cc\""}},"name":"merchantCustomerId","description":"The unique id that identify the merchant customer","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"name":"taxId","description":"To filter refund by TaxId\r\n\r\n","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
